content.name: AmrasElensar
content.setup: Two laptops - personal (full control) and government-issued (restricted)
current_challenges: Context window limits in technical discussions
content.memory_system_goals: Natural conversation style, collaborative development, avoiding file re-uploads

content.purpose: GDPR-compliant cookie consent and guided tour management
key_components: TourManager class - handles guided tour state across pages
ConsentManager class - manages GDPR cookie consent with versioning
content.real_world_usage: Implemented in Forecasting App with Dutch interface

content.description: AmrasElensar's primary development focus involving building Oracle APEX applications with PL/SQL backends
common_patterns: External plugins and custom JavaScript solutions
Custom CSS to work around APEX styling quirks
content.context: Government client work with security restrictions

content.problem: Hitting context window limits in technical discussions, having to re-upload entire files in new sessions
content.solution: Use memory system to store key architectural details and common patterns
approach: Store foundational knowledge about development environment
Focus on sharing only specific code snippets in new sessions
Build up shared understanding over time
content.target_areas: APEX applications, PL/SQL patterns, JavaScript solutions

content.problem: Docker container for MCP memory server crashing due to MCP library version incompatibility
content.solution: Abandoned Docker approach, switched to direct Python execution
key_learnings: server.start() is not blocking - need proper async patterns
Direct Python execution simpler than Docker for MCP servers
Claude Desktop manages MCP server lifecycle automatically
content.final_config: Using full venv Python path with MEMORY_FILE_PATH pointing to memory.json file
content.outcome: Successfully running advanced memory server with tiered architecture
content.source_project: claude-memory-mcp by WhenMoon-afk - more feature-rich than basic @modelcontextprotocol/server-memory
